document.full_text: yemeni loyalist forces fought a gunbattle on monday with opponents of entrenched president ali abdullah saleh one day after he backed out of an accord for him to step down.
document.title: gunbattle in yemen as transition deal collapses
lines_and_colors: yemeni loyalist forces fought a gunbattle on monday with opponents of entrenched president ali abdullah saleh one day after he backed out of an accord for him to step down.
